discourse_list.title: Media: MakerDAO Cuts Off Its AAVE-DAI Direct Deposit Module

content.content: Well, I suppose it’s no surprise that it made the news. Hey, the way I saw it was better safe than sorry. The market is harsh out there but we can turn it around. MakerDAO Cuts Off Its AAVE-DAI Direct Deposit Module

Thanks for sharing @MFeinberg Note: We saw even more media coverage on this. I believe writers from several media outlets just always keep and eye on our forum/twitter and announcements, so they write their news based on that very often

ICYMI, was front page of Bloomberg, Latest https://www.bloomberg.com/news/articles/2022-06-18/defi-platform-makerdao-pauses-some-aave-related-lending-activity  Screen Shot 2022-06-21 at 1.55.39 PM1608×1636 145 KB
Yes! You are so right. This forum speaks for Maker in many ways, as the way it should be with a DAO. The voices of the people must be heard.

TY for sharing this! I didn’t see it and I can’t read Bloomberg because they tell me I now have to subscribe which really brings up another point. Isn’t it interesting that Bloomberg can cite the community but won’t let the community read the publication. Just something I find backwards that hopefully will change. This article even cites someone from the community- very cool.
This is the real headline and context

Even several specialized Spanish-speaking media coverage this news. I only mentioned a few      Recopilación de Noticias sobre MakerDAO, DAI y MKR Latin America       Varios portales especializados de habla hispana han receptado e informado la decisión de MakerDAO de desactivar los préstamos DAI en Aave que utilizan stETH como garantía a través del Módulo de Depósito Directo (D3M), para reducir así su exposición ante el posibile colapso de Celsius.  Cabe tener presente que el D3M de Aave consta de 200 millones de DAI, de los cuales Celsius tomó prestados 100 millones.  Algunos ejemplos de la repercusión en distintos medios:
Who was quoted ? I’m not allowed to see anymore articles lol
Yeah, sorry, I meant to respond to MadShills haha.
Yea so this made the news for sure ! And it was done via vote, that is so special! Whether the community supported it or not, the simple fact that the community made this choice is really meaningful!
You never have to apologize to me friend. I can’t see the article, who is quoted from the Maker community ? Bloomberg tells me I’ve used my free views but I’m being shorted
